jobsJson.text: Software Engineer/ Senior Software Engineer, Backend, Kernel
jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
As one of Gojek's product pillars, Kernel is an evolving platform of tools & services which enable Gojek's engineering teams to manage their code & cloud infrastructure for business scale & reliability with a long term goal of creating a unified engineer toolkit & productivity engine. We create an Interface & Meta Management, Components, Deployments, Monitoring, Data Management, Logging, Identity & Auth, Networking & Security, and more ahead

Kernel Goals
- Make a scalable, reliable, predictable platform
- Design fault tolerant, distributed systems
- Enable engineers to build, test, deploy, monitor, analyse, iterate on their code
- And to manage environments, clusters, workflows, users
- Make engineer on-boarding & learning simpler

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Designing and developing highly scalable, reliable and fault tolerant distributed systems
  • To learn new languages and methodologies
  • To improve code quality, product execution and customer delight
  • To solve problems by automating
  • To pair with team members on functional and nonfunctional requirements and spread design philosophy and goals across the team

• Well versed with Lean methodologies, TDD and Test Engineering and Automation
  • Ability to design and implement low latency RESTful services
  • 2 - 8 years of hands-on experience in designing, developing, testing and deploying large scale applications in any language or stack
  • Proficiency in OOP, including design patterns. Experience with functional programming is a plus
  • Deep knowledge of Linux as a production environment
  • We primarily use Clojure, Golang, gRPC, Ruby and Java. Familiarity with two or more is a plus
  • Experienced with container technologies. e.g.: Docker, LXC
  • Experienced with Infrastructure As Code such as Terraform
  • Working knowledge of the TCP/IP stack, internet routing and load balancing
  • Basic understanding of cluster orchestrators and schedulers (Kubernetes, Mesos, LXD etc)
  • Prior experience with AWS, GCP, Azure etc. is a plus
  • Experience with CI/CD, Pipelines is a plus
